item.title: Fortnite Officially Reveals Star Wars 2024 Plans
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fortnite's Star Wars crossover event for 2024 will feature new missions, cosmetics, and activities from May 3 onwards.
  • Players can battle imperial forces, complete new Star Wars quests, and unlock rewards like unique skins and weapon blasters.
  • The event will include new items in the Item Shop such as Dagobah Luke, Beskar Car Body, and the "Mad About Me" Jam Track.

Fortnite has a wave of new Star Wars content planned across all of its connected game modes, with new missions and cosmetics being released in time for this year’s May the Fourth celebration. Fortnite and Star Wars first crossed over to promote Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker back in 2019, with the evil Emperor Palpatine announcing his resurrection in an in-game message. Character skins from the movie were also introduced, allowing Fortnite players to battle it out as Rey, Finn, Kylo Ren, and Zorii Bliss.

In the years since, the worlds of Star Wars and Fortnite have come together multiple times, often to celebrate the annual Star Wars Day on May 4. There have also been collaborations to promote Disney+ Star Wars shows like The Mandalorian , The Book of Boba Fett , and Ahsoka , with popular characters from said shows being added as playable skins alongside classic Star Wars weapons like lightsabers. Once LEGO Fortnite was introduced late last year, characters from the original Star Wars trilogy soon became playable as plastic minifigures in a creative sandbox where fans could build anything they wanted to from the Galaxy Far, Far Away.

Related
If Nintendo Ever Wants Its Own Fortnite, Mario is the Key
Over the last year, Fortnite has become a hub of entertainment, and if Nintendo ever wants to achieve the same feat, it needs to look to Mario.

With this year’s Star Wars Day only a few short days away, Epic has officially unveiled its Fortnite / Star Wars crossover plans for 2024 . The festivities will begin on May 3 and will encompass every branch of the Fortnite universe through the upcoming v29.40 update. The aforementioned LEGO Fortnite will add a new island filled with famous Rebellion and Empire ships, where players will be able to battle Imperial forces and defend a Rebel village with lightsabers, craft new Star Wars items, and explore points of interest. Players can also unlock rewards like Builds and Decor from the Mos Eisley Set by completing mission objectives in the LEGO Pass: Rebel Adventure.

Fortnite’s 2024 Star Wars Crossover Event Encompasses All Fortnite Modes

In the traditional Fortnite Battle Royale, players can join forces with Star Wars fan favorite Chewbacca to take on the Empire in a new Camp. They will also be able to pick up Chewie’s trusty Bowcaster weapon from Imperial Chests at Stormtrooper roadblocks scattered across the Island. New reward Quests and returning gameplay include a boss battle against the infamous Darth Vader, Stormtrooper NPCs, and unlockable E-11 Blasters, which will all be available in Fortnite Battle Royale through May 14.

Star Wars fans will be able to rock out to classic songs from the Mos Eisley Cantina in Fortnite Festival ’s Jam Stage starting May 3. By completing new Star Wars Quests, players can unlock a Battle Pass Level Up Reward and the Seven String Hallikset Guitar. Meanwhile, Rocket Racing is adding its own Star Wars Quests on May 3, with even more to come on May 7. These Quests have their own Battle Pass Level Up reward, along the Podracing-inspired Energy Binders Trail. Update v29.40 will add even more Quests and bonuses, including Decals inspired by Darth Maul and Anakin Skywalker’s Podracer.

Lastly, new Star Wars -themed items will be entering the Item Shop, such as the Dagobah Luke, Lando Calrissian, and AWR Trooper Outfits, the Beskar Car Body that also grants the car for Rocket League players, and the “Mad About Me” (A.K.A. “Cantina Band”) Jam Track for Fortnite Festival . All of this and more will be available to Fortnite players as part of its 2024 Star Wars collaboration, which starts later this week.

item.title: Co-Op Shooter Game With 'Very Positive' Reviews Coming to Xbox on May 31
item.description:
Highlights

  • Hypercharge: Unboxed comes to Xbox on May 31, inspired by '90s films like Toy Story and Small Soldiers.
  • The game offers up to four-player co-op, a single-player campaign mode, and can be enjoyed in both first and third-person perspectives.
  • With 14 stages, 300 customization options, and PvP modes, Hypercharge has received positive reviews and is set to launch for $29.99.

Hypercharge: Unboxed is finally coming to Xbox consoles on May 31. The shooter, set in a world of toy soldiers, has been slated to receive an Xbox console release after the viral Hypercharge craze from a couple of years ago, and it seems that time has finally come.

Hypercharge: Unboxed is an indie shooter inspired by films like Toy Story and Small Soldiers, as well as classic Saturday morning cartoons and similar games such as Army Men: Sarge's Heroes . Developer Digital Cybercherries offers gamers a wealth of content from up to four-player split-screen co-op to a single-player campaign mode for Hypercharge: Unboxed . Additionally, Hypercharge can be enjoyed in either first or third person. The developer has been adding to the game since its release in 2020 on the Nintendo Switch, but now the British studio looks to make the jump to new platforms.

Related
Hypercharge Interview: Developer Talks Future Plans, Updates, and More
Game Rant talks to Hypercharge developer Digital Cybercherries about what plans the studio has for the future, next-gen consoles, and more.

Action figure shooter Hypercharge: Unboxed is coming to Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S on May 31. Digital Cybercherries and Xbox announced the release date in a trailer featuring animation reminiscent of classic cartoons like G.I. Joe . Hypercharge will retail for $29.99 when it launches later this month, but those who wish to pre-order the title can enjoy a 10% discount. The acclaimed indie has garnered 'very positive' reviews on Steam and has been identified as a fun multiplayer title by reviewers on the Nintendo Switch.

Hypercharge: Unboxed Xbox Release Date Trailer

In addition to its whimsical aesthetic, Hypercharge boasts several features, including 14 unique stages, more than 300 customization options, and plenty of PvP modes. Since its launch, Hypercharge has grown significantly and has even garnered praise from other developers around the industry.

Hypercharge is not slated to come to Game Pass at launch, but the service is receiving plenty of additional titles this month for subscribers to enjoy. In fact, Xbox Game Pass has confirmed several games for May , including the much-anticipated follow-up to Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice . Like other first-party titles, Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 will be a day-one launch on the platform.

Xbox has already confirmed a big showcase for June, which will feature titles from Activision, Blizzard, Bethesda, and, of course, Xbox Game Studios. Microsoft has even teased that Xbox will reveal a new installment in a beloved franchise during the show as well. This is on top of a recent ID@Xbox Digital Showcase that featured debut trailers and updates for several indie games.

item.title: Elden Ring Player Beats Game Using Soldier of Godrick Build
item.description:
Highlights

  • Elden Ring player beats game with Soldier of Godrick build, showcasing unique playstyles in FromSoftware's open-world game.
  • Soldier of Godrick boss fight spawns fanbase and jokes within community, leading to dedicated player runs for added challenge.
  • None_existent0 completes 50-hour Soldier of Godrick run, using only basic armor and weapons while defeating main and optional bosses.

An Elden Ring player beat the game with a build inspired by the lone Soldier of Godrick. Since its 2022 release, FromSoftware's critically acclaimed open-world game has offered users a variety of branching customizable playstyles to suit their specific tastes, with fantasies ranging from the trusted knight with a sword and shield to powerful spellcasters with esoteric specialties. With such a rich collection of weapons and magic, one player took the opportunity to create a character inspired by one of Elden Ring 's first and most beloved boss fights.

For context, Soldier of Godrick is the boss in Elden Ring 's optional tutorial dungeon. While he may have his own boss arena and an orchestral soundtrack to go with it, the Soldier of Godrick is, in truth, not much more a threat than any of the other grunts the player would have had to defeat as they made their way through the first dungeon. Due to the ease of the battle in contrast to other FromSoftware games' tutorial bosses, the Soldier of Godrick became an inside joke within the community, which led many players to purposefully exaggerate the difficulty of the fight to poke fun at the soldier.

Related
Elden Ring’s Spirit-Caller Snail is a Fun Use Case for Repeating Boss Fights With an Interesting Twist
The Spirit-Caller Snail implements one of the best ways to iterate on previous boss fights, by twisting already difficult encounters into gauntlets.

While the Soldier of Godrick pales in comparison to the rest of Elden Ring 's boss fights , his lackluster abilities also fostered a sizable fanbase who were taken in by the lone soldier's underdog story. One such fan, Reddit user None_existent0, took it upon themselves to beat the game with a build inspired by the Soldier of Godrick, with the player using only the basic Soldier armor pieces and armaments throughout the playthrough. The Soldier of Godrick run took 50 hours to complete, with None_existent0 stating that they also defeated several difficult optional bosses, such as Malenia and Dragonlord Placidusax, along with all the main bosses.

Elden Ring Soldier of Godrick Build

  • Lordsworn's Straight Sword
  • Lordsworn's Greatsword
  • Lordsworn's Shield
  • Brass Shield
  • Godrick Soldier Helm
  • Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
  • Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
  • Godrick Soldier Greaves

Though this wasn't the first time a devoted player cleared the game as the Soldier of Godrick , fans still celebrated None_existent0's run, with users commending his rise to the Elden Throne. Several users additionally praised the Soldier of Godrick and lauded his great deeds in defeating the demigods. Other commenters jokingly claimed the run didn't count as a proper playthrough of Elden Ring and accused None_existent0 of using the most overpowered build in Elden Ring .

The Soldier of Godrick is one of the earliest enemies players will overcome in their journey through the world of Elden Ring , so it's unsurprising that the boss is such a memorable encounter despite his relative ease. Elden Ring veterans will likely take heart in knowing that the legend of "Soldier of God, Rick" continues to spread day-by-day throughout the player base even two years after the title's release.

item.title: PS5 Update Adding Helpful New Multiplayer Feature
item.description:
Highlights

  • Sony is introducing a new PS5 update allowing players to easily invite others to multiplayer sessions through shareable links.
  • PS5 players can generate links on a console or app, share via social platforms, and join sessions without being friends.
  • Unique widget on Discord shows real-time status of multiplayer sessions, making it easier for players to join PS5 games.

Sony has announced the next PlayStation 5 update will introduce a new feature for gamers interested in hosting online multiplayer sessions: the ability to invite other players or friends through a link. While the PlayStation 5 boasts a number of stellar single-player games, multiplayer games are a large part of the console's library. The PS5 has a number of features that support online gaming, such as the PlayStation App.

The PlayStation App allows players to browse the digital storefront, read news about the latest releases, and message or chat with friends and other gamers. The app also allows players to keep track of their progress on the PlayStation Stars loyalty program as well. With this app bringing integration between mobile devices and the PS5 console, Sony is introducing a new feature that affects both and can be used for inviting players to PS5 gaming sessions more easily.

Related
Free PS Plus Games for May 2024 Include Surprise Bonus Freebie
Sony finally reveals the free PlayStation Plus games coming in May 2024, and they include a surprise bonus for subscribers.

PlayStation has shared how an upcoming update will introduce the ability to generate a shareable link on either the PS5 console or PlayStation app, which can then be shared with other gamers. When this link is opened, the recipient will be able to join the host's multiplayer session, even if they aren't on their friends list. This link can be shared through other messaging or social media platforms like Discord or Twitter, making for an easy way for other gamers to join in a current gaming session.

PS5 Session Link Sharing Details

  • PS5 gamers can share a multiplayer session invite on any social platform
  • Allows for players to easily join a host's multiplayer session without needing to be friends
  • Can be generated through the PS App or PS5 console
  • Can be a URL or scannable QR code

One of the PS5's most popular online multiplayer games , Baldur's Gate 3 , was used by Sony as an example. It demonstrates that players can create the link through their PlayStation app, in the form of a URL or QR code, and then share it for anyone to join their existing session. This feature exists to complement the existing methods on PS5, as well as for players to expedite their multiplayer sessions without needing to add each other as friends on PS5 first. Players sharing these links over Discord will see a unique widget on the platform that dynamically updates in real-time to show the current multiplayer session, allowing players to see if the host is still active or not before they join.

Another feature that will be added in the coming months is the ability for players to share their or another user's PlayStation Network profile on any messaging or social media platform through the same link generation feature on the PlayStation App, the PS5 console, or the web profile. This will also allow players to easily add each other on PlayStation without needing to search for the user themselves. Most games should already be supporting this new feature, but PlayStation noted that some PS5 games may require an update for the sessions to work seamlessly.

item.title: Fallout 4 Player Spends Over 1,000 Hours Unlocking the Game's Hardest Achievement
item.description:
Highlights

  • Benevolent Leader achievement in Fallout 4 is extremely rare, with only about 7% of players achieving it.
  • Raising settler happiness in a large settlement with specific objects is key to unlocking this elusive achievement.
  • Some players have spent over 1,000 hours trying to get Benevolent Leader, while others have successfully completed it with unique strategies.

One Fallout 4 player claims to have spent well over 1,000 hours chasing the game's most rare achievement before finally reaching their goal. With an estimated 20 million copies sold and many more players accessing Fallout 4 through services like Game Pass, only a small percentage of players have pulled off this specific feat.

With Fallout 4 sales skyrocketing thanks to the popularity of the live-action series streaming on Amazon Prime more than eight years after the game's release, a new generation of achievement hunters is likely on the prowl. Still, there's one achievement that has left even a lot of long-time Fallout scratching their heads for years.

Related
Fallout 4 Players Are Recreating the TV Show's Characters in the Game
Fallout 4 players share their accurate builds of a few characters from the highly acclaimed TV adaptation on Amazon Prime Video.

The achievement in question is Benevolent Leader, which players can only get by reaching maximum happiness in a large settlement , per the game's description. Only about 7 percent of Fallout 4 's broad base of players have been able to pull off snagging the Benevolent Leader achievement, with Reddit user ConnorHunter60 claiming that it took them 1,327 hours of playtime to put this feather in their cap. Raising settler happiness can be tricky, and this player seems to have just stumbled into the achievement, stating that they wandered into a settlement they had forgotten about, added a weight bench and a trading post, and saw the elusive achievement pop up surprisingly onto their screen.

Getting The Benevolent Leader Achievement

The game's description of the achievement doesn't really give much detail as to how to actually pull it off. While it states that Benevolent Leader must be achieved at a "large" settlement, that doesn't actually refer to the number of settlers or the size of the plot of land, but rather, the number of buildings and objects the player has placed in it. Meeting the needs of normal human and ghoul settlers by providing them with sufficient food and water, defense, and beds that are sheltered from the elements will only raise their happiness to a maximum of 80, but their happiness can be boosted even higher by incorporating luxuries like animals (cats, dogs, and gorillas), shops, soda fountains, slot machines, weight benches, pommel horses, and phoropters. Some of these objects are available in the base game, while others were included in official add-ons like the Fallout 4 Vault-Tec Workshop DLC .

Other players in the Reddit thread have expressed their frustration in chasing the hardest Fallout 4 achievement and shared tips of how they pulled it off, with some suggesting a small population of four to seven settlers and a few saying to just use one. Others have been baffled by glitches in the settlement system, with bugs like a settlement suddenly registering no water (causing happiness to plummet) or the game randomly awarding the achievement before settlements have even been unlocked. However these players have been pulling it off, Benevolent Leader remains a highly coveted achievement in the Fallout community.
